roleset.name: to complain
roleset.note: GRIPE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gripe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from gripe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [`` For $ 10 million [*U*] , you can move $ 100 million [*U*]of stocks , '']-1 a specialist on the Big Board gripes [*T*-1] .
example.arg: a specialist on the Big Board
